lower-bound.name: Lower Bound
lower-bound.description: The lower bound for what speed can be selected.

upper-bound.name: Upper Bound
upper-bound.description: The upper bound for what speed can be selected.

rate.name: Rate
rate.description: The rate at which the speed changes (in ticks).

onclick.name: On Click
onclick.description: Makes the speed change each click instead of randomly.
